page.title: 15Social Activities
page.content: {Pastimes and recreations:} There are quite a lot of pastimes and recreations in the Canonbie area.Events mostly take place in the village hall.Things like bowling,cubs, occasional concerts, playschool, country dancing, badminton,whist drives and the annual flower show. In Gilnockie hall there is badminton, bowling and two suppers which are called the Burns supper and the steak supper. There are five things that go on in the hotel; darts, pool, dominoes, a leek club and bingo. The other things that go on in Canonbie include clay pigeon shooting, fishing in the river Esk, walks and orienteering competitions held in Byreburn woods. Tennis and football take place in the park
